channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
this is my client info thing keeps going to the path cannot be sepecified anything wrong
@echo off :menu cls title Client Tools by Galkon echo Client Tools echo. echo C - Compile client. echo R - Run client. echo CR - Compile, then run client immediately; be 100% sure of no errors! echo E - Exit. echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==c goto compile if %option%==C goto compile if %option%==R goto run if %option%==r goto run if %option%==rc goto CR if %option%==RC goto CR if %option%==rC goto CR if %option%==Rc goto CR if %option%==cr goto CR if %option%==CR goto CR if %option%==cR goto CR if %option%==Cr goto CR if %option%==e goto exit if %option%==E goto exit if %option%==* goto error goto error :compile title Compiler cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause goto menu :run cls title Run java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 cls pause :CR title Compile-Run cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java title Run java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 cls pause :exit cls exit :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct. pause cls goto menu

item.title: Client help

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @linkedd linkedd
item.description:
@linkedd wrote:

this is my client info thing
keeps going to the path cannot be sepecified anything wrong

@echo off
:menu
cls
title Client Tools by Galkon
echo Client Tools
echo.
echo C - Compile client.
echo R - Run client.
echo CR - Compile, then run client immediately; be 100% sure of no errors!
echo E - Exit.
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==c goto compile
if %option%==C goto compile
if %option%==R goto run
if %option%==r goto run
if %option%==rc goto CR
if %option%==RC goto CR
if %option%==rC goto CR
if %option%==Rc goto CR
if %option%==cr goto CR
if %option%==CR goto CR
if %option%==cR goto CR
if %option%==Cr goto CR
if %option%==e goto exit
if %option%==E goto exit
if %option%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
title Compiler
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
title Run
java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:CR
title Compile-Run
cls
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
title Run
java -Xmx300m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32
cls
pause
:exit
cls
exit
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu

Read full topic
